<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=321) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 135 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Strength 14; [Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate form for a longer period of time. If your next action is to cast [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481), _wild shape’s_ spell level is 2 lower than normal (minimum 1st level), but you can remain transformed for up to 1 hour or the listed duration (whichever is longer). You can still Dismiss the form at any time, as permitted by the spell.

<title level="2">Form Control leads to...</title>
[Perfect Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=351)
name: Form Control
